verses.verse: Now in the twenty <S%H6242><s%> and fourth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of this month <S%H2320><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were assembled <S%H622><s%> with fasting <S%H6685><s%>, and with sackclothes <S%H8242><s%>, and earth upon them <S%H127><s%>.

And they stood up <S%H6965><s%> in their place <S%H5977><s%>, and read <S%H7121><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%> one fourth part <S%H7243><s%> of the day <S%H3117><s%>; and another fourth part <S%H7243><s%> they confessed <S%H3034><s%>, and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>.

Then the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, Jeshua <S%H3442><s%>, and Kadmiel <S%H6934><s%>, Bani <S%H1137><s%>, Hashabniah <S%H2813><s%>, Sherebiah <S%H8274><s%>, Hodijah <S%H1941><s%>, Shebaniah <S%H7645><s%>, and Pethahiah <S%H6611><s%>, said <S%H559><s%>, Stand up <S%H6965><s%> and bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever <S%H5769><s%>: and blessed <S%H1288><s%> be your glorious <S%H3519><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, which is exalted <S%H7311><s%> above all blessing <S%H1293><s%> and praise <S%H8416><s%>.

You <S%H3068><s%>, even you, are Lord alone <S%H6213><s%>; you have made heaven <S%H8064><s%>, the heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens <S%H8064><s%>, with all their army <S%H6635><s%>, the earth <S%H776><s%>, and all things that are in it <S%H3220><s%>, the seas, and all that is in it <S%H2421><s%>, and you preserve them all <S%H6635><s%>; and the army of heaven <S%H8064><s%> worships you <S%H7812><s%>.

You are the Lord <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%>, who did choose <S%H977><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>, and brought him forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Ur <S%H218><s%> of the Chaldees <S%H3778><s%>, and gave <S%H7760><s%> him the name <S%H8034><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>;

And found <S%H4672><s%> his heart <S%H3824><s%> faithful <S%H539><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H3772><s%>, and madest a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with him to give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>, and the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%>, and the Girgashites <S%H1622><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> it <S%H2233><s%>, I say, to his seed, and have performed <S%H6965><s%> your words <S%H1697><s%>; for you are righteous <S%H6662><s%>:
And did see <S%H7200><s%> the affliction <S%H6040><s%> of our fathers <S%H1><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and heard <S%H8085><s%> their cry <S%H2201><s%> by the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>;

And showed <S%H5414><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%> upon Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and on all his servants <S%H5650><s%>, and on all the people <S%H5971><s%> of his land <S%H776><s%>: for you knew <S%H3045><s%> that they dealt proudly <S%H2102><s%> against them <S%H6213><s%>. So did you get you a name <S%H8034><s%>, as it is this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And you did divide <S%H1234><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H5674><s%>, so that they went through the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> on the dry land <S%H3004><s%>; and their persecutors <S%H7291><s%> you threw <S%H7993><s%> into the deeps <S%H4688><s%>, as a stone <S%H68><s%> into the mighty <S%H5794><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%>.

You came down <S%H3381><s%> also upon mountain <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, and spoke <S%H1696><s%> with them from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> them right <S%H3477><s%> judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and true <S%H571><s%> laws <S%H8451><s%>, good <S%H2896><s%> statutes <S%H2706><s%> and commandments <S%H4687><s%>:

And made known <S%H3045><s%> unto them your holy <S%H6944><s%> sabbath <S%H7676><s%>, and commanded <S%H6680><s%> them precepts <S%H4687><s%>, statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and laws <S%H8451><s%>, by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%>:

And gave <S%H5414><s%> them bread <S%H3899><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> for their hunger <S%H7458><s%>, and brought forth <S%H3318><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> for them out of the rock <S%H5553><s%> for their thirst <S%H6772><s%>, and promised <S%H559><s%> them that they should go in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which you had sworn <S%H3027><s%> to give them <S%H5414><s%>.
But they and our fathers <S%H1><s%> dealt proudly <S%H2102><s%>, and hardened <S%H7185><s%> their necks <S%H6203><s%>, and listened <S%H8085><s%> not to your commandments <S%H4687><s%>,

And refused <S%H3985><s%> to obey <S%H8085><s%>, neither were mindful <S%H2142><s%> of your wonders <S%H6381><s%> that you did <S%H6213><s%> among them <S%H7185><s%>; but hardened their necks <S%H6203><s%>, and in their rebellion <S%H4805><s%> appointed <S%H5414><s%> a captain <S%H7218><s%> to return <S%H7725><s%> to their bondage <S%H5659><s%>: but you are a God <S%H433><s%> ready to pardon <S%H5547><s%>, gracious <S%H2587><s%> and merciful <S%H7349><s%>, slow <S%H750><s%> to anger <S%H639><s%>, and of great <S%H7227><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%>, and forsook them not <S%H5800><s%>.

Yes <S%H6213><s%>, when they had made them a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf <S%H5695><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, This is your God <S%H430><s%> that brought you up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and had done <S%H6213><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> blasphemies <S%H5007><s%>;

Yet you in your manifold <S%H7227><s%> mercies <S%H7356><s%> forsook <S%H5800><s%> them not in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%> departed <S%H5493><s%> not from them by day <S%H3119><s%>, to lead <S%H5148><s%> them in the way <S%H1870><s%>; neither the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>, to show them window <S%H215><s%>, and the way <S%H1870><s%> where they should go <S%H3212><s%>.

You gave <S%H5414><s%> also your good <S%H2896><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> to instruct <S%H7919><s%> them <S%H4513><s%>, and withheld not your manna <S%H4478><s%> from their mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> them water <S%H4325><s%> for their thirst <S%H6772><s%>.
